title: Why some tourists visiting this holiday destination never get their bags
description: On Christmas Island, locals are not surprised if tourists' checked baggage does not arrive with them. Fragile supply chains on the remote Indian Ocean island are a part of life in this unique community.

title: The Falklands, South Georgia, and Antarctica Part II

title: This Seychelles cruise skips the resorts and goes off-grid
description: The aquamarine waters and granite, boulder-clad islands of Seychelles have long beckoned travellers. And now, a new small-ship cruise lets visitors explore these paradise islands in total luxury.
content:
